text: László Kövér (; born 29 December 1959) is a Hungarian politician. He is the current Speaker of the National Assembly of Hungary. He was the acting President of Hungary from 2 April 2012 to 10 May 2012, after the resignation of Pál Schmitt. He is a founding member of Fidesz. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Hungary
title: László Kövér
